name: John The Don
description: I came up with these characters name from a show I recently watched. Their wants came to me because every king wants land because land is powerful. All three characters want the same thing and that's why they are a conflict of interest to each other.  Each character has a different reason for why they want the land, so their thought process and decision making is on different ends of the spectrum. I made the decision choices based off of what I would have picked and what I thought flowed the best. I chose them to make the story go in the direction I wanted it to go. The most difficult part about coming up with this story was trying to make every characters decision making connect in someway. I worked to align the readers interest with the characters motivations by keeping the moral of the story relatable , but also keeping the readers on their toes so it wasn't predictable.
